| icon           = poe2 necklace_strand_of_favor icon.png
| description    = The lower Nāga castes often gift shark teeth to venerated shaman as a token of respect. The shaman weave these teeth into strands, which are worn as necklaces. The more teeth a shaman possesses, the more renown they acrue. Should the necklace be lost or destroyed, the shaman is chastised, their renown made forfeit, and they are forced to start the necklace again.

'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is an {{lc:Amulet}} in {{poe2}}.

##  Description 

{{Description |{{#var:description}}}}

##  Acquisition 

{{#arraymap: {{#var:location}}|;|x|x|\n}}

##  Notes 

If you unequip and then re-equip Strand of Favor while you still have active timed benefical effects (those with a duration) those will increase their duration by 10% every time you equip the necklace. The duration will not get reduced when unequipping it. This makes it very easy to basically endlessly prolong all timed benefical effects that won't get removed once combat ends or which can get applied out of combat (because only out of combat you can re-equip gear).

== Description ==
{{Description |{{#var:description}}}}

== Acquisition ==
{{#arraymap: {{#var:location}}|;|x|x|\n}}

== Notes ==
If you unequip and then re-equip Strand of Favor while you still have active timed benefical effects (those with a duration) those will increase their duration by 10% every time you equip the necklace. The duration will not get reduced when unequipping it. This makes it very easy to basically endlessly prolong all timed benefical effects that won't get removed once combat ends or which can get applied out of combat (because only out of combat you can re-equip gear).
